ORIGIN.DESCRIPTION: Objects imported from external systems. Use more specific origin if possible
ORIGIN.NAME: general external system

ACCESSROLE.DESCRIPTION: Real client role - the same as in production
ACCESSROLE.NAME: Client access role

NOTIFICATION.DESCRIPTION: Notification is sent when user gets new message.
NOTIFICATION.NAME: New message

NOTIFICATION.DESCRIPTION: Notification is sent when user gets new message from system
NOTIFICATION.NAME: New message from system

NOTIFICATION.DESCRIPTION: Notification is sent when user gets new message from operator
NOTIFICATION.NAME: New message from operator

NOTIFICATION.DESCRIPTION: Notification is sent for supplier to be notified about new demand
NOTIFICATION.NAME: New demand

NOTIFICATION.DESCRIPTION: Notification is sent for supplier to notified about changed offer status
NOTIFICATION.NAME: Offer status changed

NOTIFICATION.DESCRIPTION: Notification is sent for client to be notified about new offer
NOTIFICATION.NAME: New offer

NOTIFICATION.DESCRIPTION: Notification is sent for client to be notified about changed demand status
NOTIFICATION.NAME: Demand status change

NOTIFICATION.DESCRIPTION: Notification is sent when new client is activated.
NOTIFICATION.NAME: Welcome new client

NOTIFICATION.DESCRIPTION: Notification is sent when new supplier is activated.
NOTIFICATION.NAME: Welcome new supplier
